title: wsltty cannot integrate
author: jelez
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

Before opening an issue, please search for a duplicate or closed issue.
Please provide as much detail as possible for us to fix your issue.
-->

<!-- Bug -->
I am trying to integrate [WSLTTY](https://github.com/mintty/wsltty) however it pops up in a new window. It would be great if you can help fix this (its an opensource project)

I opened an issue with them as well but I doubt that they wil...

iterations.description: Current WSL support uses standard wsl.exe; unclear if user requires wsltty (mintty) embedding which is historically difficult and handled differently in IntegratedProgram.cs.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Current WSL support uses standard wsl.exe; unclear if user requires wsltty (mintty) embedding which is historically difficult and handled differently in IntegratedProgram.cs.
Approach: Ask user for configuration details and if they need tabbed embedding; investigate mintty support in IntegratedProgram.cs.
